title: "That joke went a bit far": CBB viewers question scenes showing Jedward and Nicola McLean pretending to snort lines of sugar in rockstar task

persons.name: james cosmo angie best stacy francis brandon block coleen nolan jasmine waltz ray j calum best nicola mclean jamie o'hara bianca gascoigne austin armacost james jordan spencer

text:
"That joke went a bit far": CBB viewers question scenes showing Jedward and Nicola McLean pretending to snort lines of sugar in rockstar task But other viewers found the antics "hilarious" and pointed out it was part of the rockstar task Share Comments By Lara Martin 22:06, 1 FEB 2017 Updated 22:23, 1 FEB 2017 TV this video again Video will play in Jedward snort lines of SUGAR celebs Some Celebrity Big Brother fans have questioned scenes in tonight’s programme showing Jedward and Nicola McLean pretending to snort lines of sugar during the rock band task.
The twins and Nicola were named the founding members of The Housemate Mayhem, the rock group at the centre of the brand new task.
And at the start of the rockstar episode, rows of sugar were lined up on a plate by James Cosmo , leading Nicola and Jedward to jokingly pretend to take a snort as part of their rockstar personas.
While some CBB fans found it "hilarious", it didn’t go down well with all viewers, as some of them felt it was inappropriate to even joke about drug taking on TV, even if it was only sugar.
James C lined up sugar on a plate for Jedward (Photo: Channel 5) In her role as a rockstar, Nicola jokingly pretended to snort the sugar (Photo: Channel 5) One viewer said: “Yikes I dont think #bigbrother should have television fake drug taking even if it is fake bit (sic).”
Another added: “I don't think that's a nice joke. Many young people watching and thinking it's cool.”
A third viewer said: “That cocaine joke seriously, went a bit far.”
A fourth commented: "Erm sorry don't agree with airing the whole snorting scene.. Don't care if it's only sugar."
Other viewers found the joke hilarious (Photo: Channel 5) A rep for CBB told Mirror Celeb tonight: "It was part of a task and sugar."
There was no further comment.
Not all viewers found it shocking, however, and some took to Twitter to say they found the scene hilarious.
One said: "Nicola and Jedward snorting lines of sugar is hilarious."
Another agreed: "I'm sorry, but doing lines of sugar is fucking hilarious."
A third viewer said: "People moaning cause of a few lines of sugar, it's a joke that what real rockstars are like lol."
Another said: "Here's comes the fun police moaning about them pretending to do sugar on CBB ."
Kim took the sugar away (Photo: Channel 5)
Kim Woodburn hadn’t been happy with the joke, telling Jedward it wasn’t allowed and taking the plate of sugar away from them.
“I’m sorry,” she said. “But you know perfectly well that’s not allowed. Behave yourself. There’s none of this nonsense.”
Jedward shouted back: “We don’t need that stuff! We’re trying to be rockstars! We’re a family orientated band and would never touch any white substances unless it’s snow. Snow all the way for us!”
*CBB continues tomorrow at 9pm on Channel 5
